    • Method Detail

      • decodeFile

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                 int minSize,
                                                 boolean square)
        Decode a image file into a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        filename - image file path.
        minSize - minWidth the image must have.
        square - width and height of the image should be same.
        Returns:
        the sourceType file decoded with a minimum sample size.

      • decodeFile

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decodeFile(java.lang.String filename,
                                                 int minSize,
                                                 boolean square,
                                                 boolean fixRotation)
        Decode a image file into a Bitmap.
        Parameters:
        filename - image file path.
        minSize - minWidth the image must have.
        square - width and height of the image should be same.
        fixRotation - fix image rotation based on the exif orientation information.
        Returns:
        the sourceType file decoded with a minimum sample size.

        Parameters:
        fileStream - image stream.
        Returns:
        angle in degree.

      • drawResource

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap drawResource(@NonNull
                                                   android.content.res.Resources res,
                                                   @DrawableRes
                                                   int resId,
                                                   int width,
                                                   int height)
        Draw a XML Drawable resource to a Bitmap because a XML Drawable not can be decoded by #decodeResource
        Parameters:
        res - Application Resource
        resId - Drawable Resource id.
        width - destination width
        height - destination height
        Returns:
        A transparent bitmap with the drawable painted to it.
